remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會參考其產生的音訊資料流中的輸入的裝置的位置。The property references the input device's position in its generated audio stream. 相反地，屬性會參考其音訊的輸入中的辨識器的位置。By contrast, the property references the recognizer's position within its audio input. 這些位置可能會不同。These positions can be different. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[使用語音辨識事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01c598ca-2e0e-4e89-b303-cd1cef9e8482)。For more information, see [Using Speech Recognition Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01c598ca-2e0e-4e89-b303-cd1cef9e8482).
